'''A Love Letter(?)''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Ritou Escape Plan}}. It is a letter that [[Hiiragi Chisato]] asks the [[Traveler]] to deliver to her true love, [[Kujou Kamaji]].
